Ambush Expert.Effects: Select up to two fighters in the warband. This model gains the Infiltrate ability
Ambush Expert.Name: Ambush Expert

Barbed Arrows.Effects: Ranged attacks made with Barbed Arrows get +1 to wound
Barbed Arrows.Name: Barbed Arrows

Blessing of the Lady.Effects: This Model gains a 6+ ward save
Blessing of the Lady.Name: Blessing of the Lady

Blessings of Asuryan.Effects: This model has a 4+ Ward save
Blessings of Asuryan.Name: Blessings of Asuryan

Bred for War.Effects:
-This Mount gets +1 Attack and +1 Weapon Skill
 -If this This Model would be pinned subtract 3" from its movement the next time it activates instead (This penalty does not stack)
Bred for War.Name: Bred for War

Bred to the Saddle.Effects: This model must start the game mounted
Bred to the Saddle.Name: Bred to the Saddle

Choppas.Effects: Models with this ability get +1 Strength in the first round of close combat and cannot benefit from the parry rule
Choppas.Name: Choppas

Commander.Effects: Order (Basic) – Pick a friendly fighter within 6’’. That fighter can immediately make two actions as though it were their turn to activate, even if they are not Ready. If they are Ready, these actions do not remove their Ready marker.
Commander.Name: Commander

Condemn.Effects: At the beginningof the game this Fighter elects a single enemy Fighter to condemn. This Fighter wounds the condemned fighter on 2+ with close ocmbat and ranged attacks
Condemn.Name: Condemn

Counter Charge.Effects: When an enemy model moves into engagement range with a friendly model within 6"  this model, and this model is standing and active, this model may make immediate, out of sequence Charge action against that enemy model once it has completed its Charge Action.
Counter Charge.Name: Counter Charge

Counter-Attack.Effects: When this fighter makes Reaction attacks in close combat, they roll one additional Attack dice for each of the attacker’s Attacks that failed to hit
Counter-Attack.Name: Counter-Attack

Crushing Blow.Effects: Before rolling to hit for the fighter's close combat attacks, the controlling player can nominate one dice to make a Crushing Blow. If that dice hits, the attack’s Strength and Damage are each increased by one.
Crushing Blow.Name: Crushing Blow

Deathblow.Effects: If a model with this ability is taken out of action in Close Combat, it will immediately make a single Attack back against the model that took it out of acction before being removed
Deathblow.Name: Deathblow

Dodge (Close Combat).Effects: 6+ Ward vs Close Combat weapons when on foot
Dodge (Close Combat).Name: Dodge (Close Combat)

Dodge (Ranged).Effects: 6+ Ward vs Ranged weapons when on foot
Dodge (Ranged).Name: Dodge (Ranged)

Duty.Effects: Whent his Fighter fails a Cool check roll the check again. If passed on the second attmept, this Fighter falls back as normal but will automatically regroup at the end of the round
Duty.Name: Duty

Dwarven Crafted.Effects: This model re-rolls all to hit rolls of 1 when using handguns, pistols and crossbows
Dwarven Crafted.Name: Dwarven Crafted

Elven Cloak.Effects: Ranged attacks made against a Fighter equipped with an Elven Cloak are resolved at -1 to hit
Elven Cloak.Name: Elven Cloak

Frenzy.Effects: In the turn this fighter moves into Engagement range with an enemy fighter, they gain an additional D3 Attacks. However, their hit rolls suffer a -1 modifier.
Frenzy.Name: Frenzy

Hit and Run Specialist.Effects: After resolving a charge activation, this fighter may choose to take an intitiative test. If successful, thid fighter may disengage from this combat and make a consolidation move of up to 2"
Hit and Run Specialist.Name: Hit and Run Specialist

Hold the Line.Effects: This Fighter and friendly Fighters within 3" of this model may roll 3 dice and pick the highest 2 results when taking any Cool checks
Hold the Line.Name: Hold the Line

Horse Lords.Effects: Mounts used by this model do not suffer the normal -1 to Movement for Barding
Horse Lords.Name: Horse Lords

Infiltrate.Effects: If this fighter should be set up at the start of a battle, they may instead placed to one side. Then, immediately before the start of the first round, their controlling player may set them up anywhere on the battlefield that is not visible to any enemy fighters, and not within 6’’ of any of them. If both players have fighters with this skill, take turns to set one up, starting with the winner of a roll-off.
Infiltrate.Name: Infiltrate

Iron Will.Effects: Subtract 1 from the result of any Bottle rolls whilst this fighter is on the battlefield and is not Seriously Injured.
Iron Will.Name: Iron Will

Jihad.Effects: Once per game, when this Model is activated it may call a Jihad As a free action. In the turn a Jihad is called, every model in the warband may add 1 to their Movement Characteristic
Jihad.Name: Jihad

Lead by Example.Effects: Whenever this fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action in close combat, friendly fighters within 6" get +1 to hit until the end of the round
Lead by Example.Name: Lead by Example

Lion Rampant.Effects: Two handed weapons used by a model with this ability gain the Parry ability
Lion Rampant.Name: Lion Rampant

Mark of Tzeentch.Effects: This Model gains a 6+ ward save
Mark of Tzeentch.Name: Mark of Tzeentch

Markof Nurgle.Effects: This model gains +1 Toughness and -2 Initiative
Markof Nurgle.Name: Markof Nurgle

Martial Prowess.Effects: This model re-rolls 1's when rolling to hit in close combat
Martial Prowess.Name: Martial Prowess

Murderous Prowess.Effects: This model re-rolls 1's when rolling to wound in close combat
Murderous Prowess.Name: Murderous Prowess

Peasant's Duty.Effects: Models with the Peasant's Duty may use the cool characteristic of any friendly models with the Questing Vow or the Grail Vow within 6"
Peasant's Duty.Name: Peasant's Duty

Poison Attacks.Effects: A Model with this ability gets +1 to any wound rolls made in close combat
Poison Attacks.Name: Poison Attacks

Rain of Blows.Effects: This fighter treats the Fight action as Fight (Simple) rather than Fight (Basic). In other words, this fighter may make two Fight (Simple) actions when activated.
Rain of Blows.Name: Rain of Blows

Regeneration.Effects: This model gains a 4+ ward save
Regeneration.Name: Regeneration

Scaley Skin.Effects: A model with Scaley skin is equipped with the scaley skin armour variant
Scaley Skin.Name: Scaley Skin

Scout.Effects: This Fighter can make up to 2 move activations prior to the beginning of the first round. If enemy fighters also have this ability roll of to determine who activates first
Scout.Name: Scout

Shield Wall!.Effects: If this fighter is within 2" of 2 other friendly fighters with the Shieldwall ability, who are equipped with a shield and Standing, add 1 to this fighter's Shield Roll
Shield Wall!.Name: Shield Wall!

Short and Nimble.Effects: Enemies attacking models with this rule suffer -1 To Hit in close combat
Short and Nimble.Name: Short and Nimble

Size Matters.Effects: Models with this special rule treat Goblins as having the "Hot-Headed" special rule
Size Matters.Name: Size Matters

Skirmisher.Effects: The fighter may move up to double their Movement characteristic and then make an attack with a ranged weapons. The hit roll suffers an additional -1 modifier
Skirmisher.Name: Skirmisher

Step Aside.Effects:
If the fighter is hit in close combat, the fighter can attempt to step aside. Make an Initiative check for them. If the check is passed, the attack misses. This skill can only
be used once per enemy in each round or close combat
Step Aside.Name: Step Aside

Strength in Numbers.Effects: This Model add 1 to its Cool characteristic for each friendly model with this ability within 3"
Strength in Numbers.Name: Strength in Numbers

Support Fire.Effects: When an enemy model moves into engagement range with a friendly model within 6"  this model, and this model is standing and active, this model may make immediate, out of sequence Shooting action against that enemy model. This attack does not cause pinning
Support Fire.Name: Support Fire

The Grail Vow.Effects:
Models with the Questing Vow must also take the Knight's Vow and The Questing Vow
This model gains +1 Toughness
This model gains +1 Attack
This Model gains a 6+ ward save
The Grail Vow.Name: The Grail Vow

Trollblooded.Effects: This Model gains a 5+ Ward Save
Trollblooded.Name: Trollblooded

True Grit.Effects: When making an Injury roll for the fighter, roll one less Injury dice (for example, a Damage 2 weapon would roll one dice). Against attacks with Damage 1, roll two dice – the player controlling the fighter with True Grit, can then choose one dice to discard before the effects of the other are resolved.
True Grit.Name: True Grit

Unbreakable.Effects: This Model automatically passes any cool checks it is required to make
Unbreakable.Name: Unbreakable

Valhalla.Effects: This Fighter does not take Cool checks when friendly fighters within 3" are taken out of action
Valhalla.Name: Valhalla

Waaagh!.Effects: Once per game, when this Model is activated it may call a Waaagh! As a free action. In the turn a Waaagh! is called, every model in the warband may add 1 to their Movement Characteristic
Waaagh!.Name: Waaagh!

Warpaint.Effects: This Model gains a 6+ ward save
Warpaint.Name: Warpaint

Way of the Warrior.Effects: Issue Challenge Basic Action - Choose an enemy fighter within 12". Until the end of this round, or until the chosen fighter is attacked by a friendly fighter, they must make a Intelligence check if they wish to make a ranged or close combat attack that targets any fighter other than the fighter who issued the challenge
Way of the Warrior.Name: Way of the Warrior

Will of Chaos.Effects: This model counts as passing its first failed cool check
Will of Chaos.Name: Will of Chaos

Barding.Effects: -Models with Barding Subtract 1 from their Movement Characteristic
Barding.Name: Barding

Helmet.Effects: - A Fighter with a helmet treats wound rolls of 1-6 made against it as Flesh Wounds
Helmet.Name: Helmet

Large Shield.Effects:
-A Fighter equipped with a Large Shield shield gains a 9+ Shield save
 -A shield can only be utilized in conjuntion with a single Melee weapon without the Unwieldly trait when engaged in Close Combat
Large Shield.Name: Large Shield

Mail over Padded Armour.Effects:
-Reduce the AP of attacks made against this model by 1
 -Reduce the Movement Characteristic of this Fighter by 1
Mail over Padded Armour.Name: Mail over Padded Armour

Mantlet.Effects: -A model equipped with a Mantlet loses the benefits of a Mantlet if it moves from its starting location
Mantlet.Name: Mantlet

Scale Mail.Effects: -Reduce the AP of attacks made against this model by 1
Scale Mail.Name: Scale Mail

Scale Mail over Padded Armour.Effects: -Reduce the AP of attacks made against this model by 2
Scale Mail over Padded Armour.Name: Scale Mail over Padded Armour

Small Shield.Effects:
-A Fighter equipped with a Small Shield shield gains a 10+ Shield save
 -A shield can only be utilized in conjuntion with a single Melee weapon without the Unwieldly trait when engaged in Close Combat
Small Shield.Name: Small Shield
